name: Stop the Tribe
description:
Stop the Tribe! Protect the ancient dinosaur from the interfering local tribe

In your travels across the jungle you have stumbled upon a perfectly preserved ancient beast. Such a creature could end the world, but the locals want to wake it...

Stop the locals from attempting to ressurect the beast, using only locally sourced spears and rocks!

Created for Mini Jam 98

Controls ActionKey MoveA/D JumpSpace Spear AttackJ Rock AttackK Select UpgradeJ
